original_text: And if you belong to Christ, then you are descendants of Abraham. Because of that, you will receive all the good things that God promised to Abraham.
korean_text: 너희가 그리스도의 것이면 곧 아브라함의 자손이요 약속대로 유업을 이을 자니라

sentences.original_text: And if you belong to Christ
then you are descendants of Abraham
you will receive all the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 모든 좋은 것들을 받을 것입니다
